page.title: 17Inholmes Orchard, Bur. Hill
page.content: This is a new estate in North East Burgess Hill. The estate used to be an orchard owned by Inholmes farm and is still shown as such on the Ordnance Survey map. The estate was started in 1983 and should be finished by 1986. The building is progressing quickly. This estate contains flats as well as houses. There is no special reason for this except that they wanted to have different people mixed together. A typical flat costs Â£36,500. They all have garages just at the left hand side. There are two-and three-bedroom flats. The author lives in a four bedroom house with two toilets, bathroom and shower room. It also has a dining room, lounge and kitchen. There is also a massive back garden but a small one at the front.
